name: CSSCGC - StartingNextCSSCGC_ServerSimulator
description:
Starting the next CSS Crap Game Competition 2008

You can live the excitement that a CSSCGC has while setting up the competition server!

By Firelord Quality Games 

*You will need a spectrum emulator to run this game!

** This is a Crap games competition entry. You were warned! :)

*** You can find the source code for free in many ways!
